

imports / data load
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(caret)
library(nflfastR)
pbp = load_pbp(2016:2023)
to_select = c(
  "defteam",
  "posteam",
  "down",
  "ydstogo",
  "yardline_100",
  "game_seconds_remaining",
  "half_seconds_remaining",
  "quarter_seconds_remaining",
  "play_type",
  "yards_gained",
  "epa",
  "success",
  "sack",
  "interception",
  "fumble_forced",
  "fumble_lost",
  "first_down_rush",
  "first_down_pass"
)
def_data = pbp %>%
    select(all_of(to_select))
```
